html: The scientific value of the WFIRST mission is so great that, in a 2010 survey of astronomers and astrophysicists, it was identified as the top priority large project for the coming decade. It's of huge importance to the future of astronomy. https://science.nasa.gov/researchers/sara/grant-solicitations/wide-field-infrared-survey-telescope-wfirst … 4/

html: This mission is of great value to scientists because it will aid in the pursuit of the mysteries of dark energy and dark matter, and greatly boost our search for exoplanets. 3/https://wfirst.gsfc.nasa.gov/

html: The Wide Field Infrared Survey Telescope (WFIRST) is a scientific mission to build a telescope that would have both the scope to see vast swathes of the sky and the power to see them in great detail. html: Cutting off aid to Guatemala, Honduras, and El Salvador will inflict tragedy in places where US-backed efforts are helping make good progress and giving people hope. @SenatorCarper @SenJeffMerkley @RepLBR @RepLouCorrea @DonaldNorcross and I saw it in person. This is terrible.

People who leave Guatemala, Honduras, and El Salvador to travel north are fleeing conditions there. Making those conditions worse will cause MORE migration. If we want to reduce irregular migration, we should increase aid to these countries. As I wrote: https://thehill.com/blogs/congress-blog/foreign-policy/431757-rep-beyer-what-i-learned-in-central-america?amp …https://twitter.com/RepDonBeyer/status/1112007374229987328 …
text:
People who leave Guatemala, Honduras, and El Salvador to travel north are fleeing conditions there. Making those conditions worse will cause MORE migration. 

If we want to reduce irregular migration, we should increase aid to these countries. As I wrote:
https://thehill.com/blogs/congress-blog/foreign-policy/431757-rep-beyer-what-i-learned-in-central-america?amp …https://twitter.com/RepDonBeyer/status/1112007374229987328 …

html: I went to all three countries last month. text:
HISTORY Making Day: With the passage of #HR1, the US House of Representatives today officially endorsed #DCstatehood for the first time in American history.

This vote sets the stage for consideration of HR 51, the Washington, D.C. Admission Act, which already has 200 cosponsors.

html: Republicans spent all week claiming that #HR1 "spends taxpayer money" on public financing of campaigns. It doesn't. It uses fines on tax cheats and corporate lawbreakers to match small donations. They just called that "corporate financing of our elections." MASSIVE dishonesty.
text:
Republicans spent all week claiming that #HR1 "spends taxpayer money" on public financing of campaigns.

It doesn't. It uses fines on tax cheats and corporate lawbreakers to match small donations.

They just called that "corporate financing of our elections."

MASSIVE dishonesty.

html: Today, I used an airhorn to demonstrate how disruptive seismic airgun blasting is to marine life. It was LOUD.
